story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_0200_10:
We stone enthusiasts searched caves, rock walls,
and the beach...
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_0300_10:
but unlike normal ores or sync stones, we couldn’t
find any in those places.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_0500_10:
We conducted a thorough excavation, but ended
up finding the stones in shrubbery or by the side
of the road.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_0700_10:
As you theorized, the stones weren’t accidentally
mixed with the gravel used for the artificial island.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_0800_10:
Instead, they may have come from a world other
than our own.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_0900_10:
Exactly... Like the Ultra Wormholes and the
space-time rift...
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1000_10:
we’ve encountered multiple instances of our world
being connected to a different world or period
of time.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1100_10:
I believe that these phenomena may have made it
easier for debris from other world to enter ours.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1200_10:
But this is just my assumption...and I have
no proof.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1300_10:
We’ve seen a lot more rare Pokémon on Pasio
who, like Hoopa, have mysterious powers.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1400_10:
There’s a possibility that the stones are gravitating
toward the power of these Pokémon.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1600_10:
It’s not just Pokémon that attract things from
other worlds.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1700_10:
People with special powers or characteristics can
as well.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1800_10: Yes, that could also be the case.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_1900_10: For the time being, the stones are found...
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_2000_10: mostly by sync pairs who’re skilled in battling.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_2200_10:
The stones might be gravitating toward the
powerful energy people possess.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_2300_10:
Another theory is, we’ve been seeing people from
Hisui appear here...
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_2400_10:
The fact that they’ve come here from the past
might be a factor, as well.
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_2600_10:
Rei did mention he was concerned after he felt a
presence of some sort...
story_stone_03_01000/2401_1201_2700_10:
We might want to have a conversation with him to
hear more details.
